item.title: NPC deaths teley u somewhere else
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

public static boolean IsDropping = false; public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) { if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 72) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.teleportToX = 2601; // Change coordinates ppl.teleportToY = 3776; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 83) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.teleportToX = 1928; // Change coordinates ppl.teleportToY = 5000; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 258) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.teleportToX = 2524; // Change coordinates ppl.teleportToY = 4775; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 396) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.teleportToX = 2016; // Change coordinates ppl.teleportToY = 4825; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2883) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.teleportToX = 3551; // Change coordinates ppl.teleportToY = 9693; // Change coordinates } { if (IsDropping == false) { IsDropping = true; int Play = GetNpcKiller(NPCID); int Maxi = server.itemHandler.DropItemCount; for (int i = 0; i <= Maxi; i++) { if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) { } else {

thats what i added (including a little extra)

this is error:

NPCHandler.java:910: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToX = 2601; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:911: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToY = 3776; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:916: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToX = 1928; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:917: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToY = 5000; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:922: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToX = 2524; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:923: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToY = 4775; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:928: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToX = 2016; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:929: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToY = 4825; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:934: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToX = 3551; // Change coordinates ^ NPCHandler.java:935: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ppl location: class NPCHandler ppl.teleportToY = 9693; // Change coordinates ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 10 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

mm i think i kno whats wrong…but im not sure

item.title: NPC deaths teley u somewhere else
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Look at my example…

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("Wow, you sucessfully defeated jad, have a firecape!"); ppl.addSkillXP(50000, 18); ppl.addItem(11833, 1); ppl.teleportToX = 3208; ppl.teleportToY = 3429; }

I’m reading the first post, all I see is:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 72) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 2601; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 3776; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 83) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 1928; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 5000; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 258) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 2524; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 4775; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 396) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 2016; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 4825; // Change coordinates } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2883) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 3551; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 9693; // Change coordinates }

Each teleport should be ppl.teleportToY = 9693;
